name: Laserama
description:
Prototype made for Brackeys Game Jam.  Didn't have time to do anything more than tutorial levels. Will try to update after the voting is over.

Get the lasers with the wanted color mixture to the target.

Click to rotate elements, drag to move them (click and drag on and from the bases of the elements).

Elements can only be placed on tiles.

S to toggle text overlays; hover over the starting point of a laser when overlays are disabled to see its composition.

Pan the camera with middle mouse button, rotate with right mouse and zoom with the scroll wheel.
